author: Chris Davie
title: Arda Turan ‘happy’ at Barcelona amid Arsenal transfer link
text:
Arda Turan wants to see out his contract at Barcelona. (Anadolu Agency/Getty Images) Arda Turan insists he’s happy to stay at Barcelona amid reports linking him with a move to Arsenal.
The Times claim that the Gunners are preparing a £25 million bid for the Turkey international, who they view as a potential replacement for Mesut Ozil.
The 30-year-old has started only 13 games in La Liga this season and has been heavily tipped to leave Camp Nou at the end of the campaign.
But the midfielder still has three years left on his current deal with Barcelona and intends to see out his contract.
Arda Turan is struggling for playing time at Barcelona. (Getty Images) More: Football Diego Simeone reveals how Manchester United can sign Antoine Griezmann this summer

‘Not only China there also other transfer speculations about me,’ Arda told Fanatik.
‘But I am very happy at Barcelona and I want to stay until the end of my contract.’
